mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT level, re_articleNO, re_parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(level-1)) || re_title re_title, re_content, userId, re_writeDate, re_viewCnt, rownum rno FROM shop_review WHERE re_articleNO>=0 and re_title LIKE '%' || #{s_title} || '%' START WITH re_parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR re_articleNO=re_parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY DECODE(re_viewCnt,'max(re_noti)',1), re_articleNO DESC ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
